alert.note: Alert for Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 2:42AM EST until January 29 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Coastal Rockingham, Eastern Hillsborough, and Interior Rockingham Counties. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 4 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Even light snowfall amounts can accumulate on roads and cause dangerous driving conditions due to snow covered roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The snow may be mixed with rain at the start this afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org

area.areaDesc: Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham
